tool_description: Collects real-time and historical traffic data from specified locations and time periods, aggregating measurements like vehicle counts, speeds, and occupancy rates.

location_ids.description: List of traffic sensor or intersection identifiers to collect data from

data_types.description: Types of traffic data to collect: volume, speed, occupancy, classification

error_messages: Invalid time range: start_time must be before end_time and both must be valid ISO 8601 timestamps
Location not found: One or more location_ids do not exist in the traffic monitoring system
Unsupported data type: data_types must contain only [volume, speed, occupancy, classification]
Invalid aggregation interval: aggregation_interval must be between 1 and 60 minutes
Data unavailable: No traffic data available for the specified time period and locations
usage: Specify location_ids array, start_time, end_time, and optionally data_types and aggregation_interval. Returns timestamped traffic measurements for analysis.

timestamps.description: Array of timestamp strings when measurements were taken

location_data.description: Array of location identifiers corresponding to the collected data

measurements.description: Array of traffic measurement values in the order of timestamps and locations

data_quality_score.description: Overall data quality score from 0 to 1 indicating completeness and reliability
